```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(billboard)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r, include=FALSE}
x = wiki_hot_100s |>  
  as_tibble(wiki_hot_100s) |> 
  mutate(year = as.numeric(year))
```

Which year has the most unique artists?

```{r}
x |>  
  group_by(year) |> 
  distinct(artist) |> 
  summarize(unique_artists = n()) |> 
  ggplot(aes(year, unique_artists)) +
  geom_point()

```
